# Alumni Engagement & Networking Platform - Development Guide

## Project Overview
Full-stack alumni networking platform with role-based access control, mentorship system, job postings, and analytics.

## Architecture
- **Frontend**: React + TypeScript + Vite + TailwindCSS
- **Backend**: Node.js + Express + TypeScript
- **Database**: MongoDB + Mongoose
- **Auth**: JWT-based with role-based access control

## User Roles
- Admin/Faculty: Moderation, verification, analytics
- Alumni: Verified graduates with mentorship capabilities
- Student: Current students seeking guidance

## Progress Checklist
- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md file created
- [x] Clarify project requirements
- [x] Scaffold the project structure
- [x] Customize the project with features
- [x] Install dependencies
- [x] Compile and test the project
- [ ] Launch the project
- [x] Ensure documentation is complete

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow REST API conventions
- Implement proper error handling
- Use middleware for authentication
- Keep components modular and reusable
